text:
Okay first impression is the only
impression. You've got to nail this.

Greetings children...no...hello...oh hey didn't
see you there.

Simple. Sincere. It's just the most
important moment of your life.

A mystical artifact that sketches maps
leading to the world's greatest

treasures. Oooo! Imagine all the money,
daring adventure, infinite wisdom and

untold mystery in the world literally at
your fingertips! You had me at

quill! This could be the most important moment of our adventuring lives! Sup
party people. I'm back in the hizzz-ow

No... I knew it was wrong as soon as I said it.
Sorry that was terrible.
Can I get a do-over? Hi Uncle Scrooge.
